// GENERATED CODE - PLEASE DO NOT EDIT

    private static class Invocation${methodCount}${genericTypes} extends com.github.dm.jrt.invocation.FunctionInvocation<Object, ${resultClassName}> {

        private final Object mMutex;

        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
        private final com.github.dm.jrt.core.InvocationTarget<?> mTarget;

        @SuppressWarnings("ConstantConditions")
        private Invocation${methodCount}(@javax.annotation.Nonnull final com.github.dm.jrt.builder.ProxyConfiguration proxyConfiguration,
                 @javax.annotation.Nonnull final com.github.dm.jrt.core.InvocationTarget<?> target) {

            final Object mutexTarget = ${mutexTarget};
            final String shareGroup = ${shareGroup};

            if ((mutexTarget != null) && !com.github.dm.jrt.annotation.ShareGroup.NONE.equals(shareGroup)) {

                mMutex = com.github.dm.jrt.core.RoutineBuilders.getSharedMutex(mutexTarget, shareGroup);

            } else {

                mMutex = this;
            }

            mTarget = target;
        }
